title: Junior AI/ML/Data Engineer
content: Design a machine learning model for use in the digital marketing industry, develop and run a training model, and conduct testing and analysis of the results.

title: Software Engineer
content: Reliable and secure software and systems are developed. Best practices for design and development are utilized, automated tests are created and managed, and technical issues are swiftly resolved.

title: Digital Marketing Report Specialist - Full Time
content: Prepare reports on the results of digital advertising camp paigns implemented in the Japanese market. Depending on the working hours, prepare and submit daily and weekly reports.

title: Digital Marketing Report Specialist - Part Time
content: Prepare reports on the results of digital advertising campaigns implemented in the Japanese market. Depending on the working hours, prepare and submit daily and weekly reports.
